Name: Tower of Eglathia
About the game: Tower of Eglathia is a modern-day rogue-like fantasy adventure based on a tower in the book, Eglathia, (on Amazon). As a single adventurer, choose your biography and reason for entering the tower. Then enter the tower and face a host of different monsters while building up your character with three unique skill trees: Barbarian, Mystic, and Assassin. Tower of Eglathia takes you through over 20 levels up a tower as you seek to unlock the mystery of the ancient tower. Battle over 40 unique monsters and find a vast array of magical items to assist you in your quest. Will you be the first to uncover the tower's mystery?
